creditline: The Paul C. Johnson, Jr. Fund and the Anne and Hadlai Hull Endowment for Art Acquisition
provenance: Mr. S. Tolfrey, London, by 1872. Private collection, England. Sale, Christie's, London, July 12, 2018, no. 23, to Kilgore; [Jack Kilgore & Co. 2018–2022 sold to Mia]
text: A procession of three figures stroll along a straight path cut into a verdant countryside. One of them, a girl in a golden yellow dress holding a small bouquet of flowers, walks ahead of two women whose heads are turned one to the other as if in deep conversation. One of the women is dressed in a black gown with a red tiara and muslin veil over her black hair. She is painted with her head in profile as she inclines it towards her companion who is dressed in a long white gown and wears her auburn hair in two braids that hang down her back.
title: The Evening Walk--Environs of Florence
